text: Japhet Manzambi Tanganga (born 31 March 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for club Tottenham Hotspur. ==Early life== Tanganga was born in Hackney, Greater London, to a Congolese family. He went on to attend Greig City Academy and at the age of 10 joined the Tottenham Hotspur youth academy. ==Club career== In June 2019 Tanganga had his contract with Tottenham extended until 2020. On 24 September 2019, he made his debut in the EFL Cup away to Colchester United. He made his full Premier League debut at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium against Liverpool on 11 January 2020. Three days later he played the full 90 minutes against Middlesbrough in a FA Cup replay, which Spurs won 2–1 and was named man of the match. On 27 July 2020, Tanganga signed a new contract with Tottenham, valid until 2025. ==International career== Tanganga has represented England youth levels at under-16, 17, 18, 19 and 20. In 2014, Tanganga represented the England under-16 team against Scotland in the Victory Shield. In 2017, he took part in the Toulon Tournament and was a second-half substitute in the final as England defeated Ivory Coast to retain their title. Tanganga also played at the 2018 UEFA European Under-19 Championship and scored in their opening group game against Turkey. On 2 October 2020, Tanganga received his first call up to the England U21 squad but withdrew on 5 October 2020. ==Career statistics== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|FA Cup !colspan=2|EFL Cup !colspan=2|Europe !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3|Tottenham Hotspur U23 |2017–18 |colspan=3|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||2||0||2||0 |- |2018–19 |colspan=3|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||3||0||3||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !colspan=2|—!!colspan=2|—!!colspan=2|—!!colspan=2|—!!5!!0!!5!!0 |- |rowspan=3|Tottenham Hotspur |2019–20 |Premier League |6||0||3||0||1||0||1||0||colspan=2|—||11||0 |- |2020–21 |Premier League |0||0||0||0||1||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !6!!0!!3!!0!!2!!0!!1!!0!!colspan=2|—!!12!!0 |- !colspan=3|Career total !6||0||3||0||2||0||1||0||5||0||17||0 |} ==Honours== England U20 *Toulon Tournament: 2017 ==References== ==External links== *Profile at the Tottenham Hotspur F.C. website * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Hackney, London Category:English footballers Category:England youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Premier League players Category:Black English sportspeople Category:English people of Democratic Republic of the Congo descent
